text: Jean-Louis Bernard (31 March 1938 - 26 March 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France and represents the Loiret department from 1993 to 2012. He was a member of the Radical Party. He was the mayor of Orléans from 1988 to 1989. Bernard was born in Saulieu, Côte-d'Or. Bernard died on 26 March 2020 at the age of 81.Ancien maire d'Orléans, le docteur Jean-Louis Bernard est décédé ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:People from Côte-d'Or
title: Jean-Louis Bernard
